jfxtras.labs.scene.control.gauge.linear

Class LinearGauge<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.control.Control
            • jfxtras.labs.scene.control.gauge.linear.LinearGauge<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicArcGauge, SimpleMetroArcGauge

    public abstract class LinearGauge<T>
extends javafx.scene.control.Control

    This class contains commonalities for all linear gauges
